column1: Beware, this will return to $40 where it should be. A PE ratio of 19 is not the industry standard. Plus, almost 2x book value is not the industry standard. 1.1 -1.3x book is about right, an PE ratio of around 13-14 is about right..,..so it's a $40 stock.
